Customize your rental applications and screen tenants instantly.

Completely FREE for Brokers & Property Managers

Sign Up Log in

1. You send a link

Sign up and get a unique link to your application. We also have links to 100s of other landlord applications. Simply send your applicant a link and they'll fill out an online application form.

2. Applicant Applies

The applicant applies online through any interent connected device. Once they submit their application. We'll email you.

3. You get the application

Log on to see their application, paperwork and background checks immediately

Gather paperwork prior to showings

Brokers that request their tenants paperwork prior to showing them apartments are much more likely to have a qualified tenant and close a deal. When you sign up you'll get a link to a form that you can send your clients so you can request their paperwork prior to taking them out.

Screen Tenants Instantly

Our application is able to instnatly produce background checks including credit reports, criminal background, landlord tenant history, verification of employement and residency. 

Payments are made through our secure online system. This take out the need to collect application fees via cash or check (unless you want to).  Our system also allows landlords, property managers, and brokers to collect processing fees.

Customize Your Application

We understand you may request specific information on your application. If you don't like our default form you can easily customize your own application using our drag-and-drop form builder. 

Try it! It's Completly FREE for brokers, landlords & property managers...
